properties.areaDesc: Dyer, TN; Obion, TN; Gibson, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 8:49AM CST until January 15 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...L'anguille
River...Obion River...S.F. of the Forked Deer River...Saint Francis
River...Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Obion River near Obion
* until Wednesday January 15.
* At 08 AM Tuesday the stage was 34.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.5 feet on Tuesday January 14.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Monday January 13 and will
continue rising to near 34.5 feet by Tuesday January 14. The river
will fall below flood stage Wednesday January 15.
* At 35.0 feet...Several secondary roads and large areas of farm land
are flooded in northern Dyer County. Flooding is occurring around
Rives in southeast Obion County.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
